title: April fools game mode idea
body:
I thought of this game mode while playing norms and it'll be funny if we get some sort of "reverse rift" map when instead of you playing as actual champions, you play as the jungle monster that have their own unique abilities as if they were actually champions, for example

Gromp
passive: poisons any enemy whenever they auto attack you 
Q: shoots out a poison glob of spit 
ect ect and their entire kits are somehow based on how they actually fight in the jg on norms then replace all jg camps with champions thatll match that jg monster, tahm kench in gromps spot, ww (and mini wws)  in the wolves spot, azir and mini azirs in the raptors and so on, the towers and minions will be weaker to make the game go faster, other than that it'll be like a normal game.


another quick idea for an April fools game mode is that you pick a champion you want in champ select but when you load into the game you will randomly have another champions abilities and you will have to adapt your play style to fit whatever abilities you have
